description.narrative: A program proposal (July 2017) has been submitted to Sweden's Embassy in Bolivia through the Resident Coordinator's Office in Bolivia entitled "COORDINATED GENDER STRATEGY ONE-UN IN BOLIVIA 2017-2020." The project proposes a UN Joint Action, for enhanced coordination with 5 UN organizations: UNFPA, UNICEF, UN Women, UNODC, UNDP and the co-ordinating Office of the Resident Coordinator (ORC) in Bolivia. The aim is to "promote gender equality in Bolivia under UNDAF-Bolivia strategy". The project is part of the implementation of UNDAF Bolivia's main program and further intends to secure commitment and ownership among UN organizations operating in Bolivia, as well as establishing a common framework for follow-up, learning and evaluation. The overall budget is in support of coordination and coordination. The program both means strengthening the results for gender equality per se as a methodology of strengthening coordination in ONE UN spirit without requiring co-programming. The program is for the period (2017-2020). The total amount sought for the project amounts to 3MSEK.

Ett programförslag (juli 2017) har inkommit till Sveriges ambassad i Bolivia genom Resident Coordinators kontor i Bolivia med titeln ”COORDINATED GENDER STRATEGY ONE- UN IN BOLIVIA 2017-2020". Projektet föreslår en gemensam FN-insats, för ökad samordning tillsammans med 5 FN organisationer: UNFPA, UNICEF, UN Women, UNODC, UNDP samt den samordnande ORC (Office of the Resident Coordinator) i Bolivia. Syftet är att "främja jämställhet i Bolivia inom ramen for UNDAF-Bolivia strategi”. Projektet ingår i genomförandet av UNDAF Bolivias huvudprogram och avser vidare att säkra engagemang och ägarskap bland FN-organisationer verksamma i Bolivia, samt att etablera ett gemensamt ramverk för uppföljning, lärande och utvärdering. Den totala budgeten går till stöd för koordinering och samordningen. Programmet innebär både ett stärkande av resultaten för jämställdhet per se som en metodutveckling vad gäller stärkt samordning i ONE UN anda utan att kräva samprogrammering. Programmet är fyraårigt (2017-2020). Det totala sökta beloppet för projektet uppgår till 3MSEK.

Increase the efficiency and sustainability of the actions implemented by the different agencies in the country for gender equality and the exercise of the rights of women, children and adolescents, which are articulated in the UNDAF 2018-2022.

description.narrative: The actions developed by the UN agencies in the implementation of the Gender CoordinationStrategy are detailed below: 1. Initial diagnosis: focused ongaps and complementarities of the UN actions on gender and equality at nationallevel . 2. Development of a virtual tool inside the UN Bolivia page. 3. National Convention against Trafficking and Trafficking in Persons. 4. Development of joint activities in the framework of international days for women's rights and gender equality: International Women's Day (March 8), week of arts and culture, November 25 Dayagainst Gender Violence, 70th Anniversary of the Universal Declaration of HumanRights. 5. compilation of publications of the agencies on gender equality 6. Identification of information gaps that have allowed the initiation of processes for the development of two investigations: - Research on the interaction between violence against women and violence against children and adolescents - Research on the investment of economic resources for the implementation of The new Law and Regulation 348 and law 548
No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
